items.name: The Powerpuff Girls Z Wiki
items.title: The Powerpuff Girls Z Wiki
items.headline: The Powerpuff Girls Z Wiki
items.desc: Welcome to the Powerpuff Girls Z Wiki! This site is dedicated to be a source of information about "Powerpuff Girls Z", or PPGZ, a magical girl anime series based on the American animated television series "The Powerpuff Girls". The main characters Hyper Blossom, Rolling Bubbles, and Powered Buttercup are turned into heroes by Chemical Z, and they must defend their home from new villains that Chemical Z created! Enter now to learn more and help the wiki grow!
